name: Sea of Artifice
description:
You're a plant. Sort of.  You run down a twisted aquarium where water is nowhere to be seen and yet, life down there still thrives. Your gun seems to have something odd about it, as if it was one with time.

This was made for the purpose of the Brackeys Game Jam, but I intend on developing this one further as a lot of features had to be taken out due to time constraints. To beat the game in its jam edition, you must kill all enemies. 

Known issues:

- Sometimes the bullet will go through the player when using the rewind ability too quickly

- Sometimes the game may not end after killing all enemies due to a collision detection bug
